snippet: Tom Dalzell has walked all over Berkeley documenting the city’s material oddities — adding fire to a debate over how quirky Berkeley really is.
abstract: Berkeley Journal; Tom Dalzell has walked nearly 150 miles of Berkeley, Calif, documenting its material oddities block by block on his blog Quirky Berkeley; site adds to heated debate over how bohemian city really is.
lead_paragraph: Tom Dalzell has walked all over Berkeley documenting the city’s material oddities — adding fire to a debate over how quirky Berkeley really is.

headline.main: A Step-by-Step Guide to Berkeley’s Many Quirks
headline.print_headline: A Step-by-Step Guide to a City’s Quirks
